show_id - This is a unique ID for every Movie or TV show
type - Identifier to identify whether it is a  A Movie or TV Show
title -  This is the title of the Movie or the TV Show
cast - Actors involved in the movie or TV show
country - Country where the movie or TV show was produced
date_added - Date it was added on Netflix
release_year - Actual Release year of the movie or TV  show
rating - rating for shows or movies
duration - time taken by movies or tv shows
listed_in - genre of show 
description - details of the movie
month_added - month obtained from release year
month_name_added -month_name_added segregatted from release year
year_added - year segregatted from release year
first_country - cleaned data from country column, contains name of single country only
count - number to time the country occurs
